price: This is because your Lord would never destroy a town for their wrongdoing while its people are unaware [of the truth].
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ أَن لَّمۡ يَكُن رَّبُّكَ مُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ بِظُلۡمٖ وَأَهۡلُهَا غَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
